meanings.definition: To throw or discard something suddenly or forcefully.
meanings.sent1: She jetsoned the old clothes into the donation bin.
meanings.sent2: He jetsoned the broken toy into the trash can.
meanings.sent3: The kids decided to jetson their unfinished homework into the recycling bin.
meanings.sent4: The strong wind jetsoned the umbrella out of her hands.
meanings.sent5: The chef jetsoned the burnt toast into the trash with a swift motion.

meanings.definition: A person who is suddenly thrown or discarded from a moving vehicle or object.
meanings.sent1: The jetson landed on the grass after falling off the swing.
meanings.sent2: The jetson stumbled after being pushed off the skateboard.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy jetson tripped and fell off the bike.
meanings.sent4: The jetson quickly got up after being thrown off the horse.
meanings.sent5: The jetson laughed after being playfully tossed into the pool.
